title: What are some good Tamil songs to sing on stage without music for an alto singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Oru nallil vazhkkai” “ஒரு நாளில் வாழ்க்கை” from pudhupettai “Enna naan seivem” “என்ன நான் செய்வேன்” Meyadha maan “Megamo aval” “மேகமோ அவள்” from Meyadha maan “Idhu kadhala” “இது காதலா” thulluvadho ilamai “Nee partha paarvai” “நீ பார்த்தப் பார்வை” from hey ram “Kannane kanne” “கண்ணான கண்ணே” from nanum rowdy dhan “Maya nadhi” “மாய நதி” from kabali “Netru aval irundhan” “நேற்று அவள் இருந்தாள்” from maryan “Natpinale oru” “நட்பினிளே ஒரு” from chennai-600028 So these are the songs which sounds good even without any background music playing. Hope you find the answer is useful….

What are Tamil songs? You’re askin’ the wrong guy. A capella alto? Good luck with that. Break a leg. I bet you totally kill it. I’m quite interested in how your performance is received. Will you let me know? Just in case you didn’t know— Break a leg is a traditional encouragement in American theatre. Killin’ it is doing an awesome job of something.
